modName: Shakuntala - Lore-Friendly and Marriagable High Elf Rogue V1
summary: Adds the Altmer rogue Shakuntala into the world of Tamriel. She's loyal, has no morals and will do whatever you tell her to. Perfect for Dragonborns who are not exactly....good.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]A NOTE REGARDING THIS AND MY OTHER MODS: Hola! It's been a very long time, but I have returned to Skyrim. I'm currently in the process of getting my personal game set up how I like it, which includes going back to my original mods and attempting to see what I can do with them. I've decided to start with the one mod I did that most people did not like. I've put a new emphasis on her looks because that's what most people blasted her on originally. As you can see, I think here in 2018 I have done a much better job.

She currently has no release date as I am still setting up shop, but soon I should have her done and tested and will prepare a proper release.

[s]I will not be putting out any new versions of Lydia The Unburdened, Shakuntala or Visarra until I upgrade my PC sometime early next year. I will not return to Skyrim until that time (I still have Dragonborn and Falskaar to finish so I have plenty reason to return) so I can play / run in full Ultra settings. I will update with more info when available. Thank you for your use of my mods![/s][/size][s]
[/s]
SHAKUNTALA THE ROGUE[/b]
------------------------------------------
VERSION 1.0

[b][color=red][size=3]NOTE: YOU WILL NEED APACHII SKY HAIR OR YOUR GAME WILL CRASH.[/size][/color][/b]

REQUIRES- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachii Sky Hair[/url]

This mod is best experienced with the following mods (my screenshots use these):

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Caliente's CBBE[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url] (Elven races by default in Skyrim, are not very pretty)

[b]COMPATIBILITY:[/b] Skyrim base game, no expansions required.

[color=yellow][b]QUICK-LIST OF FEATURES:[/b][/color]

Version 1.0

+High Elf Rogue
+Lore-friendly, sticks with Bethesda's visual style of elves.
+Dual-Wielding
+No morality and no remorse
+Completely loyal
+Marriagable
+Increased foot speed lets her keep up with the fastest Dragonborn.
+Knows the "Muffle" spell, can be taught other spells via mods like U.F.O.

[color=yellow]SHAK IN MOTION:[/color]
[youtube]0u_WiNyK-F4[/youtube]
This is an older video, and will be updated as time permits.

[color=yellow][b]DETAILED FEATURES:[/b][/color]

Version 1.0

Based on a long-time friend of mine and her character, adds a beautiful high elf rogue to the game named Shakuntala. She will dual-wield and has no remorse, will dispatch whoever you tell her to, and doesn't care what you do. Perfect companion for a thief, a warlock or any other shady-style Dragonborn.

She prefers light armors, but will wear whatever you tell her to. She comes equipped with a plain set of clothes and can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. If you fancy her, she will marry you. She has a increased speed setting and will seem to move in a blur at times, as a true master rogue should. She comes equipped with the "Muffle" spell, but can learn other ones if you have a companion mod like U.F.O. installed.

[b]Try my other mods![/b]

[b]LYDIA THE UNBURDENED 3.0[/b] - Turn Lydia into a 7ft tall Nordic Barbarian.
@Skyrim Nexus: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20107]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20107[/url]
@Steam Workshop: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=80815442]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=80815442[/url]

[b]VISARRA[/b] - Lovely orc warrior companion. Lore-friendly and marrigable.
@Skyrim Nexus: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20209]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20209[/url]
@Steam Workshop: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=81090941]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=81090941[/url]

Thanks!
[i]SchwarzerWind[/i]
author: Schwarzerwind
